trans-unit.source: Specifies the security settings for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpBinding"></xref>.
This class specifies the security settings for the `wsDualHttpBinding` binding.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpSecurity"></xref> class.
Gets the message-level security properties for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpBinding"></xref>.
The object returned specifies detailed message-level security properties for the `wsDualHttpBinding` binding.

The default values include: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverHttp.ClientCredentialType"></xref> is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageCredentialType.Windows"></xref>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverHttp.AlgorithmSuite"></xref> is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite.Basic256"></xref>, and <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverHttp.NegotiateServiceCredential"></xref> is `true`.
Gets or sets the security mode for the parent <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpBinding"></xref>.
The value of this property determines whether message-level security is applied to the binding.
The value is not a valid <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpSecurityMode"></xref>.
Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpSecurity.Message"></xref> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
This is used by WCF for XAML integration.
`true` if the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpSecurity.Message"></xref> property value should be serialized; otherwise, `false`.
Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpSecurity.Mode"></xref> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
This is used by WCF for XAML integration.
`true` if the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpSecurity.Mode"></xref> property value should be serialized; otherwise, `false`.
